languages.text: [Повернуться к Паскалю] "Ты слышал слова Авеля? Мы, похоже, внесли лепту в замысел Амарната — отклонились от Цикла. Что это значит для тебя?"
[Turn to Pasqal] "Did you hear what Abel said? It seems we have contributed to Amarnat's design and deviated from the Cycle. What does that mean for you?"
languages.original_text: [Повернуться к Паскалю] "Ты слышал слова Авеля? Мы, похоже, внесли лепту в замысел Амарната — отклонились от Цикла. Что это значит для тебя?"

traits.locale_text: [Turn to Pasqal] "Did you hear what Abel said? It looks like we have contributed to Amarnat's design and deviated from the Cycle. What does that mean for you?"
[Turn to Pasqal] "Did you hear what Abel said? It looks like we have contributed to Amarnat's design and deviated from the Cycle. What does that mean for you?"
[Turn to Pasqal] "Have you heard what Abel said? It looks like we have contributed to Amarnat's design and deviated from the Cycle. What does that mean for you?"

[Turn to Pasqal] "Did you hear what Abel said? It seems we have contributed to Amarnat's design and deviated from the Cycle. What does that mean for you?"
[Turn to Pasqal] "Did you hear what Abel said? It seems we have contributed to Amarnat's design and deviated from the Cycle. What does that mean for you?"

languages.text: [パスカルの方へ向く]「アベルの話は聞いたか？どうやら我々はアマルナトのデザインに貢献して、サイクルから逸脱してしまったようだ。この件はお前にとってどういう意味を持つ？」
languages.original_text: [Turn to Pasqal] "Did you hear what Abel said? It seems we have contributed to Amarnat's design and deviated from the Cycle. What does that mean for you?"

traits.locale_text: [パスカルの方へ向く]「アベルの話は聞いたか？どうやら我々はアマルナトのデザインに貢献して、サイクルから逸脱してしまったようだ。この件はお前にとってどういう意味を持つ？」

languages.text: [对帕斯卡开口]“你听到亚伯刚刚说什么了吗？看来，我们都在协助实现阿玛纳特的构想，让循环偏离轨道。这对你来说意味着什么？”
languages.original_text: [Turn to Pasqal] "Did you hear what Abel said? It seems we have contributed to Amarnat's design and deviated from the Cycle. What does that mean for you?"

traits.locale_text: [对帕斯卡开口]“你听到亚伯刚刚说什么了吗？看来，我们都在协助实现阿玛纳特的构想，让循环偏离轨道。这对你来说意味着什么？”

languages.text: [Pasqal zuwenden] "Habt Ihr gehört, was Abel gesagt hat? Anscheinend haben wir in Amarnats Sinn gehandelt und sind vom Zyklus abgewichen. Was bedeutet das für Euch?"
languages.original_text: [Turn to Pasqal] "Did you hear what Abel said? It seems we have contributed to Amarnat's design and deviated from the Cycle. What does that mean for you?"

traits.locale_text: [Pasqal zuwenden] "Habt Ihr gehört, was Abel gesagt hat? Anscheinend haben wir in Amarnats Sinn gehandelt und sind vom Zyklus abgewichen. Was bedeutet das für Euch?"

languages.text: [Vous tourner vers Pasqal] « Vous avez entendu Abel ? Apparemment, nous avons contribué au dessein d'Amarnat et dévié du Cycle. Qu'est-ce que cela signifie à vos yeux ? »
languages.original_text: [Turn to Pasqal] "Did you hear what Abel said? It seems we have contributed to Amarnat's design and deviated from the Cycle. What does that mean for you?"

traits.locale_text: [Vous tourner vers Pasqal] « Vous avez entendu Abel ? Apparemment, nous avons contribué au dessein d'Amarnat et dévié du cycle. Qu'est-ce que cela signifie à vos yeux ? »

languages.text: [Dirigirte a Pasqal] «¿Ha oído lo que ha dicho Abel? Parece que hemos propiciado los designios de Amarnat y nos hemos desviado del Ciclo. ¿Qué significa eso para usted?».
languages.original_text: [Turn to Pasqal] "Did you hear what Abel said? It seems we have contributed to Amarnat's design and deviated from the Cycle. What does that mean for you?"

traits.locale_text: [Dirigirte a Pasqal] «¿Ha oído lo que ha dicho Abel? Parece que hemos propiciado los designios de Amarnat y nos hemos desviado del Ciclo. ¿Qué significa eso para usted?».

languages.text: [Pasqal'a dön] "Abel'in ne dediğini duydun mu? Görünüşe göre Amarnat'ın tasarımına katkı yapmış ve Döngü'den ayrılmışız. Bundan çıkarımın nedir?"
languages.original_text: [Turn to Pasqal] "Did you hear what Abel said? It seems we have contributed to Amarnat's design and deviated from the Cycle. What does that mean for you?"

traits.locale_text: [Pasqal'a dön] "Abel'in ne dediğini duydun mu? Görünüşe göre Amarnat'ın tasarımına katkı yapmışız ve Döngü'den ayrılmışız. Bu senin için ne anlam ifade ediyor?"
